name: Jigsaw Puzzle Villa－Design
description:
Welcome to the Puzzle Competition World! Justin needs your help! Win the championship by solving jigsaw puzzles! Renovate the Villa! Solve a jigsaw puzzle, earn coins, and buy modern things for the house! Turn an abandoned mansion into a stunning Villa!

Enjoy your hobby by taking part in the Jigsaw Puzzle competition with Justin!



HOW TO PLAY

1. Put puzzles together within colorful HD pictures;

2. Get energy and coins, and spend them to decorate the Mansion;

3. Use boosters and hints to solve puzzles - design the House as soon as possible!

4. Renovate the first room and go to the next one, which will be even more interesting! There are so many rooms in this old house!

5. Follow the captivating plot of Justin’s puzzle competition story.



You have an amazing opportunity to renovate and decorate an old Spanish Villa - the way you want!

But remember, solving puzzles is an important mission. You can choose the difficulty level and the number of puzzle pieces. Do puzzles to open more furniture for the Mansion!



FEATURES:

- immersion in exciting puzzles solving competitions;

- a combination of free puzzles and home design gameplay will bring fun to the game;

- more than 1000 colorful HD pictures!

- opportunity to choose puzzle difficulty (more pieces – more coins!)

- hints to help with jigsaws;

- great choice of different furniture pieces and house decorations;

- a huge number of rooms awaiting renovation!

- the exciting plot of Justin’s story;

- captivating dialogues;

- excellent graphics and sound;

- free game with in-app purchases - make faster progress through the story!

- regular updates with new levels and furniture pieces!



Do you like puzzles and interior design games? Download the Jigsaw Puzzle game!

Solve more jigsaw puzzles and help Justin win the World Puzzle Championship!
